title: Set up GitHub Actions CI pipeline — run build + tests on every PR
description: Create a GitHub Actions workflow that runs automatically on every pull_request targeting master or main. The pipeline must block merging if build or tests fail.
acceptance_criteria: Workflow triggers on: pull_request targeting master or main
Step 2: npm run build (TypeScript + Vite — fails on type errors or build errors)
Step 3: npm test (Vitest unit tests — fails if any test fails)
PR shows green checkmark when all steps pass
PR shows red X and blocks merge when any step fails
Node version matches project (check .nvmrc or package.json engines field)
E2E tests (Playwright) are NOT included — too slow for PR CI, run manually
notes: Do not include npm run test:e2e in the CI pipeline — Playwright requires a running dev server and browser binaries, making it too slow for PR checks. Unit tests + build check is sufficient for blocking bad PRs.
